snippet: The strong showing of the sometimes-unpredictable Tea Party favorite, Chris McDaniel, in the Republican primary offered Democrats the opportunity to highlight his controversial views.
abstract: Strong showing of Tea Party favorite Chris McDaniel in Mississippi's Republican primary race for Senate offers Democrats the opportunity to highlight his controversial views; McDaniel, whose showing in primary will force a runoff against incumbent Sen Thad Cochran, has made incendiary remarks about women, immigration and homosexuality, the kind of baggage the party is eager to shed as it seeks to win over female and minority voters.
lead_paragraph: The strong showing of the sometimes-unpredictable Tea Party favorite, Chris McDaniel, in the Republican primary offered Democrats the opportunity to highlight his controversial views.

headline.main: Democrats See a Break in a Gain for the Tea Party in Mississippi
headline.print_headline: Democrats See a Break in a Gain for the Tea Party in Mississippi
